meanings.definition: A person who performs Kegel exercises.
meanings.sent1: The kegelers at the gym are dedicated to their pelvic floor workouts.
meanings.sent2: The group of kegelers meets every week to practice their exercises.
meanings.sent3: The kegelers had a friendly competition to see who could hold the exercise the longest.
meanings.sent4: She was as focused as a kegeler, determined to strengthen her pelvic muscles.
meanings.sent5: The kegelers' commitment to their exercises was truly inspiring.

meanings.sent1: The kegelers gathered around the table for their weekly meeting.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of kegelers walking into the fitness center together.
meanings.sent3: The kegelers decided to form a team for the upcoming exercise challenge.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with the chatter of kegelers sharing their progress.
meanings.sent5: The kegelers' unity was evident in their synchronized movements.
